text: He muminagana! Tomara imana ana allahara prati, tamra rasulera prati, ebam se kitabera prati ya allaha tamra rasulera upara nayila karechena. Ara se granthera prati'o ya tara purbe tini nayila karechena. Ara ye byakti allaha, tamra phirisatagana, tamra kitabasamuha, tamra rasulagana o sesa dibasera prati kuphari kare [1] se sudura bibhrantite patita halo
